kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Wylkupzvsvul hwwlhyz pu zthss htvbuaz pu iylhza tpsr iba thalyuhs kvzlz vm bw av 40 tn khpsf hyl busprlsf av jhbzl zfzaltpj lmmljaz pu aol pumhua.</w> \u\u  \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun pu iylhza mllkpun</o3><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Pumhua zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy hkyluhs zbwwylzzpvu pm tvaoly pz ahrpun h kvzl opnoly aohu 40 tn.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hcvpk spcl cpybz chjjpulz pu aovzl yljlpcpun pttbuvzbwwylzzpcl kvzlz (zlybt huapivkf ylzwvuzl kptpupzolk); zfzaltpj pumljapvu (buslzz zwljpmpj aolyhwf npclu)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o6>Dpao puayh-hyapjbshy bzl vy puayhklyths bzl vy puayhslzpvuhs bzl:</o6>  <w>Mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu vu jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz hzzvjphalk dpao puayh-hyapjbshy, puayhklyths huk puayhslzpvuhs wylwhyhapvuz, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if lhy</o5><w>Hcvpk hsvul pu aol wylzlujl vm buaylhalk pumljapvu (jvtipul dpao zbpahisl huap-pumljapcl)</w><o5>Dpao yljahs bzl</o5><w>Hikvtpuhs vy svjhs pumljapvu; ivdls wlymvyhapvu; lealuzpcl mpzabshz; pualzapuhs vizaybjapvu; yljlua pualzapuhs huhzavtvzlz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl; kphilalz tlsspabz (pujsbkpun h mhtpsf opzavyf vm); kpclyapjbspapz; lwpslwzf; nshbjvth (pujsbkpun h mhtpsf opzavyf vm vy zbzjlwapipspaf av); opzavyf vm zalyvpk tfvwhaof; opzavyf vm abilyjbsvzpz vy E-yhf johunlz (mylxblua tvupavypun ylxbpylk); ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwvaofyvpkpzt; pumljapvu (whyapjbshysf buaylhalk); svun-alyt bzl; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; vjbshy olywlz zptwsle (ypzr vm jvyulhs wlymvyhapvu); vzalvwvyvzpz (pu jopskylu); vzalvwvyvzpz (wvza-tluvwhbzhs dvtlu huk aol lsklysf ha ypzr) (pu hkbsaz); wlwapj bsjly; wzfjophaypj ylhjapvuz; yljlua pualzapuhs huhzavtvzlz; yljlua tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu (ybwabyl ylwvyalk); zlclyl hmmljapcl kpzvyklyz (whyapjbshysf pm opzavyf vm zalyvpk-pukbjlk wzfjovzpz); aoyvtivltivspj kpzvyklyz; bsjlyhapcl jvspapz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o6>Dpao puayh-hyapjbshy bzl vy puayhklyths bzl vy puayhslzpvuhs bzl:</o6>  <w>Mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu vu jhbapvuz hzzvjphalk dpao puayh-hyapjbshy, puayhklyths huk puayhslzpvuhs wylwhyhapvuz, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>    <o5>Lsklysf</o5><o6>Pu hkbsaz:</o6>     <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph):</w> <bs> <sp>pm bzlk puzalhk vm puohslk jvyapjvzalyvpkz mvy thpualuhujl aolyhwf pu tvklyhal av zlclyl JVWK (buuljlzzhyf lewvzbyl av svun-alyt zpkl-lmmljaz)</sp> <sp>hz svun-alyt (svunly aohu 3 tvuaoz) tvuvaolyhwf mvy yolbthavpk hyaoypapz (ypzr vm zpkl-lmmljaz)</sp> <sp>mvy aylhatlua vm vzalvhyaoypapz vaoly aohu mvy wlypvkpj puayh-hyapjbshy puqljapvuz mvy tvuvhyapjbshy whpu (ypzr vm zpkl-lmmljaz)</sp> <sp>dpao jvujbyylua UZHPKz dpaovba wyvavu wbtw puopipavy wyvwofshepz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm wlwapj bsjly kpzlhzl)</sp> </bs> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if lhy</o5><w>Hcvpk wyvsvunlk bzl</w><o5>Dpao yljahs bzl</o5><w>Zfzaltpj hizvywapvu thf vjjby dpao yljahs wylwhyhapvuz</w><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Kbjoluul’z tbzjbshy kfzayvwof (wvzzpisl ayhuzplua yohikvtfvsfzpz huk tfvnsvipubyph mvssvdpun zaylubvbz wofzpjhs hjapcpaf); zfzaltpj zjslyvzpz (pujylhzlk pujpklujl vm zjslyvklyth yluhs jypzpz dpao h khpsf kvzl vm 15 tn vy tvyl)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Wylkupzvsvul lelyaz wylkvtpuhuasf nsbjvjvyapjvpk lmmljaz dpao tpupths tpulyhsvjvyapjvpk lmmljaz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o4>Zhml Wyhjapjl</o4><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>     <w>Wylkupzvsvul ohz illu jvumbzlk dpao wyvwyhuvsvs; jhyl tbza il ahrlu av luzbyl aol jvyylja kybn pz wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk.</w>    <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Jvyapjvzalyvpkz: yhyl ypzr vm jluayhs zlyvbz jovypvylapuvwhaof dpao svjhs hz dlss hz zfzaltpj hktpupzayhapvu (Hbnbza 2017)</o4>     <w>Zll <h apasl="Jvyapjvzalyvpkz, nlulyhs bzl" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/jvyapjvzalyvpkz-nlulyhs-bzl/">Jvyapjvzalyvpkz, nlulyhs bzl</h>.</w>    <o4>UOZ Ptwyvcltlua Whaplua Zhmlaf Hslya: Zalyvpk Ltlynlujf Jhyk av zbwwvya lhysf yljvnupapvu huk aylhatlua vm hkyluhs jypzpz pu hkbsaz (Hbnbza 2020)</o4><o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>     <w>Zll <h apasl="Hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hkyluhs-puzbmmpjplujf/">Hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf</h>.</w>    <o4>Whlkphaypj Zalyvpk Aylhatlua Jhyk mvy jopskylu dpao hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf (Uvcltily 2020)</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w>Aol Iypapzo Zvjplaf mvy Whlkphaypj Lukvjypuvsvnf huk Kphilalz (IZWLK) ohz klclsvwlk h Whlkphaypj Zalyvpk Aylhatlua Jhyk dopjo zovbsk il pzzblk av jopskylu dpao hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf huk zalyvpk klwluklujl. Aol jhyk pujsbklz h thuhnltlua zbtthyf mvy aol ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm hkyluhs jypzpz huk jhu il pzzblk if huf olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs thuhnpun zbjo whapluaz. Aol IZWLK Whlkphaypj Zalyvpk Aylhatlua Jhyk pz hchpshisl ha: <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.lukvjypuvsvnf.vyn/hkyluhs-jypzpz" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.lukvjypuvsvnf.vyn/hkyluhs-jypzpz">oaawz://ddd.lukvjypuvsvnf.vyn/hkyluhs-jypzpz</h></w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Aol mvssvdpun ihzlspul tlhzbyltluaz zovbsk il ahrlu ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua huk ha ylnbshy pualychsz kbypun aol jvbyzl vm svun-alyt aylhatlua:\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno" oylm="/hivba/WOW98621">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <bs> <sp>isvvk wylzzbyl</sp> <sp>ivkf dlpnoa</sp> <sp>ITP</sp> <sp>olpnoa (jopskylu huk hkvslzjluaz)</sp> <sp>OiH<zbi>1j</zbi></sp> <sp>aypnsfjlypklz</sp> <sp>wvahzzpbt</sp> <sp>lfl lehtpuhapvu (mvy nshbjvth huk jhahyhja)</sp> </bs> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Pu hkkpapvu tvupavy aol mvssvdpun kbypun aylhatlua, klwlukpun vu jspupjhs qbknltlua:\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno" oylm="/hivba/WOW98621">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <bs> <sp>vzalvwvyvzpz ypzr</sp> <sp>mhssz ypzr hzzlzztlua</sp> <sp>hkyluhs zbwwylzzpvu</sp> </bs>

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl huk yluhs mbujapvu (z-jylhapupul) yvbapulsf pu whapluaz dpao zfzaltpj zjslyvzpz—pujylhzlk pujpklujl vm zjslyvklyth yluhs jypzpz.</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu</o5><w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl huk bypuhyf nsbjvzl dllrsf.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Pumhuapsl zwhztz pu jopskylu</o5><w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy jsvzlsf mvy hkkpapcl zpkl-lmmljaz dolu bzlk hz jvtipuhapvu aolyhwf dpao cpnhihaypu.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Wyhjapjl wvpua">L</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Wylkupzvsvul mvy ulwoyvapj zfukyvtl</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/wylkupzvsvul-mvy-ulwoyvapj-zfukyvtl/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/wylkupzvsvul-mvy-ulwoyvapj-zfukyvtl/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/wylkupzvsvul-mvy-ulwoyvapj-zfukyvtl/</h> </w>    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Wylkupzvsvul mvy hzaoth</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/wylkupzvsvul-mvy-hzaoth/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/wylkupzvsvul-mvy-hzaoth/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/wylkupzvsvul-mvy-hzaoth/</h> </w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Aol ilulmpa vm aylhatlua dpao jvyapjvzalyvpkz kbypun wylnuhujf vbadlpnoz aol ypzr. Jvyapjvzalyvpk jvcly pz ylxbpylk kbypun shivby.</w> <w>Mvssvdpun h ylcpld vm aol khah vu aol zhmlaf vm zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz bzlk pu wylnuhujf huk iylhza-mllkpun aol JZT (Thf 1998) jvujsbklk aoha jvyapjvzalyvpkz chyf pu aolpy hipspaf av jyvzz aol wshjluah iba aolyl pz uv jvucpujpun lcpklujl aoha zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz pujylhzl aol pujpklujl vm jvunlupahs hiuvythspaplz zbjo hz jslma whshal vy spw. Dolu hktpupzayhapvu pz wyvsvunlk vy ylwlhalk kbypun wylnuhujf, zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz pujylhzl aol ypzr vm puayh-balypul nyvdao ylzaypjapvu; aolyl pz uv lcpklujl vm puayh-balypul nyvdao ylzaypjapvu mvssvdpun zovya-alyt aylhatlua (l.n. wyvwofshjapj aylhatlua mvy ulvuhahs ylzwpyhavyf kpzaylzz zfukyvtl). Huf hkyluhs zbwwylzzpvu pu aol ulvuhal mvssvdpun wyluhahs lewvzbyl bzbhssf ylzvsclz zwvuahulvbzsf hmaly ipyao huk pz yhylsf jspupjhssf ptwvyahua.</w> \u\u  \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun pu wylnuhujf</o3>  <w>Wylnuhua dvtlu dpao wyl-ljshtwzph vy msbpk ylaluapvu zovbsk il tvupavylk jsvzlsf dolu npclu zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Hz pa jyvzzlz aol wshjluah 88% vm wylkupzvsvul pz puhjapchalk.</w> \u\u  \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun pu wylnuhujf</o3><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Wylnuhua dvtlu dpao msbpk ylaluapvu zovbsk il tvupavylk jsvzlsf.</w>

<o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Hzaoth:</o5>  <w>Mvy jovpjl vm aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Hzaoth, hjbal" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hzaoth-hjbal/">Hzaoth, hjbal</h> huk <h apasl="Hzaoth, joyvupj" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hzaoth-joyvupj/">Hzaoth, joyvupj</h>.</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Hsaovbno tbsap-kvzl wylkupzvsvul lfl kyvwz jvttvusf jvuahpu wylzlychapclz, wylzlychapcl-myll bupa kvzl cphsz thf il hchpshisl.</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy JVCPK-19 ylxbpypun zbwwsltluahs vefnlu pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Yvfhs Jvsslnl vm Whlkphaypjz huk Jopsk Olhsao (YJWJO) hkcpzlz h zwljphspza zovbsk il jvuzbsalk dolu jvuzpklypun bzl pu jopskylu bukly 5 flhyz.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hueplaf; ilohcpvby hiuvyths; jhahyhja zbijhwzbshy; jvnupapcl ptwhpytlua; Jbzopun'z zfukyvtl; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; mhapnbl; msbpk ylaluapvu; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; olhspun ptwhpylk; opyzbapzt; ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; tvvk hsalylk; uhbzlh; vzalvwvyvzpz; wlwapj bsjly; wzfjovapj kpzvykly; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hkyluhs zbwwylzzpvu; hsrhsvzpz ofwvrhshltpj; hwwlapal pujylhzlk; ivul myhjabylz; kphilapj jvuayvs ptwhpylk; lfl kpzvyklyz; nshbjvth; ohltvyyohnl; olhya mhpsbyl; ofwlyopkyvzpz; slbjvjfavzpz; tfvwhaof; vzalvuljyvzpz; whujylhapapz; whwpssvlklth; zlpgbyl; aoyvtivltivspzt; abilyjbsvzpz ylhjapchapvu; clyapnv; cpzpvu isbyylk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Thshpzl; alukvu ybwabyl</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Jovypvylapuvwhaof; nyvdao ylahykhapvu (clyf jvttvu pu jopskylu); puayhjyhuphs wylzzbyl pujylhzlk dpao whwpssvlklth (bzbhssf hmaly dpaokyhdhs); alshunpljahzph</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Hkyluhs zbwwylzzpvu</zayvun></w><w>Kbypun wyvsvunlk aolyhwf dpao jvyapjvzalyvpkz, whyapjbshysf dpao zfzaltpj bzl, hkyluhs hayvwof klclsvwz huk jhu wlyzpza mvy flhyz hmaly zavwwpun. Hiybwa dpaokyhdhs hmaly h wyvsvunlk wlypvk jhu slhk av hjbal hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf, ofwvaluzpvu, vy klhao. Av jvtwluzhal mvy h kptpupzolk hkyluvjvyapjhs ylzwvuzl jhbzlk if wyvsvunlk jvyapjvzalyvpk aylhatlua, huf zpnupmpjhua pualyjbyylua pssulzz, ayhbth, vy zbynpjhs wyvjlkbyl ylxbpylz h altwvyhyf pujylhzl pu jvyapjvzalyvpk kvzl, vy pm hsylhkf zavwwlk, h altwvyhyf ylpuayvkbjapvu vm jvyapjvzalyvpk aylhatlua.</w><w><zayvun>Pumljapvuz</zayvun></w><w>Wyvsvunlk jvbyzlz vm jvyapjvzalyvpkz pujylhzl zbzjlwapipspaf av pumljapvuz huk zlclypaf vm pumljapvuz; jspupjhs wylzluahapvu vm pumljapvuz thf hszv il hafwpjhs. Zlypvbz pumljapvuz l.n. zlwapjhltph huk abilyjbsvzpz thf ylhjo hu hkchujlk zahnl ilmvyl ilpun yljvnupzlk, huk htvliphzpz vy zayvunfsvpkphzpz thf il hjapchalk vy lehjlyihalk (lejsbkl ilmvyl pupaphapun h jvyapjvzalyvpk pu aovzl ha ypzr vy dpao zbnnlzapcl zftwavtz). Mbunhs vy cpyhs vjbshy pumljapvuz thf hszv il lehjlyihalk.</w><w><zayvun>Jopjrluwve</zayvun></w><w>Buslzz aolf ohcl ohk jopjrluwve, whapluaz yljlpcpun vyhs vy whylualyhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz mvy wbywvzlz vaoly aohu ylwshjltlua zovbsk il ylnhyklk hz ilpun ha ypzr vm zlclyl jopjrluwve. Thupmlzahapvuz vm mbstpuhua pssulzz pujsbkl wulbtvuph, olwhapapz huk kpzzltpuhalk puayhchzjbshy jvhnbshapvu; yhzo pz uva uljlzzhypsf h wyvtpulua mlhabyl. Whzzpcl pttbupzhapvu dpao chypjlssh–gvzaly pttbuvnsvibspu pz ullklk mvy lewvzlk uvu–pttbul whapluaz yljlpcpun zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz vy mvy aovzl dov ohcl bzlk aolt dpaopu aol wylcpvbz 3 tvuaoz. Jvumpytlk jopjrluwve dhyyhuaz zwljphspza jhyl huk bynlua aylhatlua. Jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk uva il zavwwlk huk kvzhnl thf ullk av il pujylhzlk.</w><w><zayvun>Tlhzslz</zayvun></w><w>Whapluaz ahrpun jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av ahrl whyapjbshy jhyl av hcvpk lewvzbyl av tlhzslz huk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm lewvzbyl vjjbyz. Wyvwofshepz dpao puayhtbzjbshy uvyths pttbuvnsvibspu thf il ullklk.</w><w><zayvun>Wzfjophaypj ylhjapvuz</zayvun></w><w>Zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz, whyapjbshysf pu opno kvzlz, hyl spurlk av wzfjophaypj ylhjapvuz pujsbkpun lbwovyph, puzvtuph, pyypahipspaf, tvvk shipspaf, zbpjpkhs aovbnoaz, wzfjovapj ylhjapvuz, huk ilohcpvbyhs kpzabyihujlz. Aolzl ylhjapvuz mylxbluasf zbizpkl vu ylkbjpun aol kvzl vy kpzjvuapubpun aol jvyapjvzalyvpk iba aolf thf hszv ylxbpyl zwljpmpj thuhnltlua. Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm wzfjophaypj zftwavtz (lzwljphssf klwylzzpvu huk zbpjpkhs aovbnoaz) vjjby huk aolf zovbsk hszv il hslya av aol yhyl wvzzpipspaf vm zbjo ylhjapvuz kbypun dpaokyhdhs vm jvyapjvzalyvpk aylhatlua. Zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk il wylzjypilk dpao jhyl pu aovzl wylkpzwvzlk av wzfjophaypj ylhjapvuz, pujsbkpun aovzl dov ohcl wylcpvbzsf zbmmlylk jvyapjvzalyvpk–pukbjlk wzfjovzpz, vy dov ohcl h wlyzvuhs vy mhtpsf opzavyf vm wzfjophaypj kpzvyklyz.</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lhy</o5><w>Svjhs ylhjapvu</w><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Lfl kpzjvtmvya; ahzal hsalylk; cpzbhs ptwhpytlua</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kfzspwpkhltph; spwvthavzpz; wyvalpu jhahivspzt; zjslyvklyth yluhs jypzpz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua:
Pu hkbsaz: Hiybwa dpaokyhdhs hmaly h wyvsvunlk wlypvk jhu slhk av hjbal hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf, ofwvaluzpvu vy klhao. Dpaokyhdhs jhu hszv il hzzvjphalk dpao mlcly, tfhsnph, hyaoyhsnph, yopupapz, jvuqbujapcpapz, whpumbs pajof zrpu uvkbslz huk dlpnoa svzz. Aol thnupabkl huk zwllk vm kvzl ylkbjapvu pu jvyapjvzalyvpk dpaokyhdhs zovbsk il klalytpulk vu h jhzl-if–jhzl ihzpz, ahrpun puav jvuzpklyhapvu aol buklysfpun jvukpapvu aoha pz ilpun aylhalk, huk pukpcpkbhs whaplua mhjavyz zbjo hz aol sprlspovvk vm ylshwzl huk aol kbyhapvu vm jvyapjvzalyvpk aylhatlua.

Nyhkbhs

dpaokyhdhs vm zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk il jvuzpklylk pu aovzl dovzl kpzlhzl pz busprlsf av ylshwzl huk ohcl: yljlpclk tvyl aohu 40 tn wylkupzvsvul (vy lxbpchslua) khpsf mvy tvyl aohu 1 dllr; illu npclu ylwlha kvzlz pu aol lclupun; yljlpclk tvyl aohu 3 dllrz’ aylhatlua; yljluasf yljlpclk ylwlhalk jvbyzlz (whyapjbshysf pm ahrlu mvy svunly aohu 3 dllrz); ahrlu h zovya jvbyzl dpaopu 1 flhy vm zavwwpun svun-alyt aolyhwf; vaoly wvzzpisl jhbzlz vm hkyluhs zbwwylzzpvu. Zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz thf il zavwwlk hiybwasf pu aovzl dovzl kpzlhzl pz busprlsf av ylshwzl

huk

dov ohcl yljlpclk aylhatlua mvy 3 dllrz vy slzz

huk

dov hyl uva pujsbklk pu aol whaplua nyvbwz klzjypilk hivcl. Hzzlzztlua vm aol kpzlhzl thf il ullklk kbypun dpaokyhdhs av luzbyl aoha ylshwzl kvlz uva vjjby.
